rows.label: qst710302_msg0001
rows.name:
How is it? Have you collected
the machine parts?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0101
rows.name:
Yes, you've collected
them well! Thank you!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0102
rows.name: Alright! It's complete! Hee hee hee!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0103
rows.name:
I call it the Gennai Special
"Endless Music Box"!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0104
rows.name:
As its name suggests, once you wind it up,
it's an excellent item that won't stop
playing no matter what impact it receives!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0105
rows.name:
Hmm? Then how do you
stop it, you ask...?

rows.label: qst710302_msg0106
rows.name:
Hee hee hee! Come to think of it, I
didn't think of a way to stop it!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0107
rows.name: Well, I'll think about that later.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0108
rows.name:
Right then! As a thank you for
helping me collect the parts, I'll
teach you all how to make it too.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0110
rows.name:
From the joy of completion, a new
invention idea has sprung forth!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0111
rows.name:
The next invention will be an
amazing thing that solves the
shortcomings of the last one!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0112
rows.name:
But, for this, it seems I'll need a
lot of parts that can withstand the
dry climate around the capital.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0113
rows.name:
I believe I've heard a rumor
that such parts can be found
in various places in Gula.

rows.label: qst710302_msg0114
rows.name:
Well then, I'll leave the parts
collection to you all again!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0115
rows.name:
This time too, you just need
to collect the machine parts
and give them to me!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0201
rows.name:
To complete this invention,
I still need more machine
parts lying around in Iira!

rows.label: qst710302_msg0202
rows.name:
I especially need a lot of round
gears, so if you find any, could
you prioritize giving them to me?
